item.title: Don't Go (feat. Lights)
item.description: [[songs/b/billy_talent/afraid_of_heights/timebomb_ticking_away.md#beat-down-like-a-slave-to-the-grind-vyl-wnanory|I was raised in the valley]] [[songs/b/billy_talent/afraid_of_heights/timebomb_ticking_away.md#beat-down-like-a-slave-to-the-grind-vyl-wnanory|There were shadows and death]] [[songs/b/billy_talent/afraid_of_heights/timebomb_ticking_away.md#beat-down-like-a-slave-to-the-grind-vyl-wnanory|Got out alive but with scars I can’t forget]] [[songs/b/billy_talent/afraid_of_heights/leave_them_all_behind.
